total_revenue.context: Better than expected despite supply constraints, strong foreign exchange headwinds, and impact of business in Russia

regional_records: Near doubling of revenue in India

segments.name: iPhone

revenue.context: Up 3% year-over-year, despite significant foreign exchange headwinds

key_points: June quarter record for revenue and switchers
Strong double-digit growth in emerging markets: Brazil, Indonesia, Vietnam
Near doubling of revenue in India
Installed base of active iPhones at an all-time high across all geographic segments
98% customer satisfaction for iPhone 14 family
Expansion of emergency SOS via satellite to additional countries

iphone_14: Groundbreaking suite of health and safety features
Incredible power and amazing battery life
iphone_14_pro: Most powerful camera system ever in an iPhone
Dynamic Island for new interaction methods

segments.name: Services
key_points: Double-digit revenue growth from App Store subscriptions
All-time revenue records for cloud services, payment services, and music
June quarter records for App Store and AppleCare
Over 900 million paid subscriptions

achievements.nominations: 74th Primetime Emmy Awards: 9 statues including Best Comedy Series for Ted Lasso
achievements.academy_awards: Spirited won Best Animated Short Film

highlights: Access to every live MLS regular season game, playoffs, and MLS Cup with no blackouts

new_features: Premium sound experience with AirPods and HomePod
Fitness+ updates with new kickboxing and sleep meditation themes

achievements: Among most successful US credit card programs

segments.name: Mac

revenue.context: Down 29% year-over-year, in line with expectations

key_points: Challenging compare due to last year's launch of M1 MacBook Pros
Strong upgrade activity to Apple silicon
Installed base of active Macs at an all-time high across all geographic segments
96% customer satisfaction in US

new_products.macbook_pro: New models powered by M2 Pro and M2 Max offering unprecedented performance and energy efficiency
new_products.macbook_air: Latest MacBook Air with enhanced performance

segments.name: iPad

revenue.context: Down 13% year-over-year due to significant negative foreign exchange and challenging compare

key_points: Challenging compare due to launch of new iPads a year ago
Installed base reached a new all-time high
Incredible customer loyalty
Over 50% of customers new to iPad
New lineup praised for versatility

product_highlights.ipad_10th_gen: Stunning liquid retina display and beautiful colors

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories

revenue.context: Up 10% year-over-year driven by launch of Apple Watch and new AirPods Pro

key_points: All-time revenue record for Wearables, Home and Accessories
Installed base of devices set a new all-time record
Nearly two-thirds of Apple Watch buyers were new to the product
High customer loyalty and satisfaction
Apple Watch Series 8: temperature sensing, ovulation estimates, crash detection
Apple Watch SE: advanced features at new low price
Apple Watch Ultra: advanced navigation tools, Oceanic+ app for diving
Second generation AirPods Pro with H2 chip and improved noise canceling

apple_watch_ultra: Set a new standard for wearables
Breakthrough features for extreme athletes and adventurers
homepod: Advanced computational audio for incredible listening experience
Sound recognition feature for safety notifications
airpods: Maintaining status as best and most popular headphones globally

gross_margin.context: Down 40 basis points from last quarter due to seasonal loss of leverage and unfavorable foreign exchange, partially offset by favorable mix

products_gross_margin.context: Up 10 basis points sequentially, improved leverage and favorable mix partially offset by foreign exchange

services_gross_margin.context: Down 30 basis points sequentially, primarily due to foreign exchange

expectations.revenue: Total company year-over-year revenue performance will decelerate during the December quarter compared to the September quarter
expectations.foreign_exchange: Nearly 10 percentage points of negative year-over-year impact
expectations.iphone_and_services: Accelerating year-over-year performance for iPhone; Services expected to grow but impacted by macroeconomic factors
expectations.mac_and_ipad: Double-digit year-over-year declines expected due to challenging compares and macroeconomic headwinds
expectations.net_income_effect: Around negative $300 million excluding mark-to-market impacts

share_repurchases.details: Authorized for future repurchases to achieve net cash neutral over time

new_products: MacBook Air and MacBook Pro with M2 chip
Apple Watch Series 8, SE, and Ultra
software_updates: iOS 16: customizable lock screen, focus filters, new features in Messages and Mail
iPadOS 16: Stage Manager for smoother multitasking
macOS Ventura: Stage Manager for productivity
watchOS 9: Sleep App, AFib history feature, Medications app
Clean Energy charging feature for iPhone

new_markets: Apple American Dream in New Jersey
store_updates: Opened Apple Creative Studios partnerships with non-profits
Celebrated 25 years of the Apple online store

key_programs: Use of 100% recycled rare-earth elements in iPhone 14
Use of recycled gold in HomePod printed circuit boards
Clean Energy charging feature for iPhone
Commitment to sourcing more recycled materials across product lineup

programs: Coding 5K Camp for Girls in San Jose

metadata.installed_base: All-time record for installed base of active devices
